job.command:
starver dev
set RND_SEED=`expr &nIndex; \* 1000`
echo echo "codePath: " &codePath; echo "RND_SEED: " $RND_SEED echo
ls -al
ln -s ./GenerateVertex.C ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C set my_command='root4star -q -b ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C(0,&nEvents;,'$RND_SEED',"@'$FILELIST'","vertex.txt")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $my_command eval '$my_command' >&! &outPath;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_vertex.log
set my_command="starsim -w 0 -b ./simWRequest.kumac nevents=&nEvents; config=&sample; run=&runNumber; seed=$RND_SEED file=$FILEBASENAME.fzd vertexfile=vertex.txt" echo echo "Executing..." echo $my_command eval '$my_command' >&! &outPath;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_starsim.log
set my_command='root4star -q -b ./bfcMixer_pythia.C(&nEvents;,"@'$FILELIST'","'$FILEBASENAME'.fzd","P14igpp510","","W")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $my_command eval '$my_command' >&! &outPath;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_bfcMixer.log
ls -al
